content: lion brand pattern # 70118ad skill level easy level 2 a 920-106 babysoft yarn pastel blue 1 ball b 910-144 microspun yarn lilac 3 balls crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm special stitch v_stitch gauge 4 v-stitches + 5 row = 4 in 10 cm with 1 strand each of a and b held together work in pattern with 1 strand each of a and b held together for 34 row do not break yarn crochet picot border to finish available in several yarn weights see ravelry 70117ad 1 in jiffy 70118ad in babysoft and microspun 70119a 2 in cotton-ease 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/v_stitch-blankie-70117ad 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/little-v_stitch-blanket-70119a
